content: belgian waffles socks are knit cuff-down in the round ribbed cuff flows seamlessly into the traveling slip-stitch also known as twisted stitch print on the leg and instep pattern has classic mid-calf leg length but is very easy to adjust classic slip-stitch heel matches the print and ensures durability of your socks it is also easily adjustable for your individual rise the sock is finished with a classic rounded toe and kitchener graft at the tip the way the print stands out against the reverse stockinette background made me think of belgian waffles with their deep pockets these socks also give me that same warm and fuzzy feeling with a slight hint of indulgence as eating a delicious waffle it has a classic and feminine fit is very easy to knit and is perfect for sunny spring days **size** eu 25 -30 31 - 36 37 - 42 43 - 47 us chain 8 - 12 5 chain 13 - 13 5 or f 1-5 f 6 - 9 5 or m 5 - 8 5 m 9 - 12 5 **gauge** 30 sts x 44 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in stockinette for more precise result swatch in the round on the same needles you will use for the socks **needles** 2 5mm us 1 5 or size to get pattern gauge in your preferred format of sock needles either 5 dpns long 80-100 cm 32-40 circulars for magic loop or short ~25 cm 9 circulars etc **yarn** 100g or ~380-420 m 415-460 yds of heavy fingering-weight yarn sample was knit out of 2 balls of mondim retrosaria 100 % portuguese wool 100 g / 385 m 421 yds **notions** 3 markers 2 can be the same + 1 unique for bor cable needle optional you can easily work twisted sts without one tapestry needle scissors tape measure sock blockers optional in case you are not familiar with some of the techniques additional videos on my channel will help you to understand the instructions - click here 1 check other socks on instagram - #belgianwafflessocks 2 1 https //www youtube com/@veranikabarel/featured 2 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/belgianwafflessocks/
